table_foot: The diffusion values in medians and inter quartile ranges (IQR) for the sports-related concussion (SRC) athletes (diffusion tensor imaging [DTI] n = 20 and diffusion kurtosis imaging [DKI] n = 19) and controls (DTI n = 21 and DKI n = 20). The global white matter (WM) metric values and the p values of the group comparisons are presented for the investigated metrics. DTI metrics are fractional anisotropy (FA), mean diffusivity (MD), axial diffusivity (AD) and radial diffusivity (RD), and DKI metrics are FA, MD, AD, RD, mean kurtosis (MK), axial kurtosis (AK) and radial kurtosis (RK). Significant p values ≤0.05 are bolded.
